Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

coalitions 0.6.18 2021-03-18

  • fix CRAN errors
  • fixes error introduced by dependencies (see #132)
  • fixed a Bug in dHondt function (see #130)

coalitoins 0.6.15 2020-08-31

  • fixes CRAN errors

coaltions 0.6.12 2020-02-06

  • fixes CRAN errors #119 (see also #118)
  • fixes scrapper function for GMS table #118
  • changes nest/unnest usage to new tidyr syntax
  • some roxygen fixes

coalitions 0.6.9 Unreleased

  • fixed scrapper for austrian general election #110
  • added more federal election scrappers #113
  • documentation updates

coalitions 0.6.5 2018-10-06

  • Fixed scrapper for federal German “Hessen” election
  • Fixed tests

coalitions 0.6.4 2018-08-27

  • Add scrapers for federal German “Hessen” election

coalitions 0.6.3 Unreleased

  • Update HP with new pkgdown version

coalitions 0.6.2 2018-03-15

  • Added reference to Description and examples to functions as per CRAN request

coalitions 0.6.1 Unreleased

  • Minor fixes after JOSS review, thx to Reviewer @fsolt
  • Updated homepage (via pkgdown )
  • Added current JOSS badge

coalitions 0.6.0 (2018-03) Unreleased

  • Added vignette on pooling

coalitions 0.5.7 (2017-12) Unreleased

  • Added federal Bavarian election scrapers

coalitions 0.5.1 (2017-03) Unreleased

  • Major overhaul
  • More robust functions, more tests
  • Most functions comply with tidyverse
  • Improved documentation, added vignettes, created homepage (via pkgdown)
